statements.select: SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName , AA.UserID , AA.RoleID , AA.UseYn , AA.Description FROM dbo.TUserRole AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName , AA.UserID , AA.RoleID , AA.UseYn , AA.Description FROM dbo.TUserRole AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.UserID = #UserID# AND AA.RoleID = #RoleID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TUserRole ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, UserID, RoleID, UseYn ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #UserID#, #RoleID#, #UseYn# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TUserRole SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName= #UpdatedByName#
, UserID = #UserID# , RoleID = #RoleID# , UseYn = #UseYn# WHERE ID = #ID#
